channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2025010712
item.description:
Report X-2025010712

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: GALLUP
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TILX 202010 was found in the Gallup, NM yard with residue around the manway nozzle. Three swing bolts were also found to be loose. BNSF haz manager responded and found the three hand-loose swing bolts along with the other three that were less than tool-tight. Upon opening the manway lid, the nozzle gasket was in very bad condition and folded over on itself for about eight inches. The nozzle gasket was replaced and the swing bolts tool-tightened.

item.title: Report X-2025010713
item.description:
Report X-2025010713

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T00:48:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: GALLUP
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SHQX 7246 was found by an FRA inspector to have residue around the manway during an inspection. BNSF responder opened up the manway lid and found that there was no manway nozzle gasket. The responder installed a new manway gasket and tool-tightened the swing bolts.
